Definition: OncoKb level1 FDA-recognized biomarker predictive of response to an FDA-approved drug in this indication.
OncoKb level2 Standard care biomarker recommended by the NCCN or other expert panels predictive of response to an FDA-approved drug in this indication.
OncoKb level3A Compelling biological evidence supports the biomarker as being predictive of response to a drug.
OncoKb level4 Compelling biological evidence supports the biomarker as being predictive of response to a drug.
levelR1 Standard care biomarker predictive of resistance to an FDA-approved drug in this indication."
levelR2 Compelling clinical evidence supports the biomarker as being predictive of resistance to a drug.
Mutation Allele Frequency (also called variant allele frequency)
